snippet.title: Yedoma Globula pre-alpha trailer
snippet.description:
Fractal exploration game I develop in my free time. Currently in early prototype / tech demo state.

Please follow me on twitter:
https://twitter.com/Bananaft

Yes, there is a build, but it's a bit outdated (Nov 2017)
I will update it someday, hopefully with a proper gameplay demo.
https://bananaft.itch.io/yedomaglobula 

Tech info:
It is built on Urho3d engine with customized render pipeline.  It uses cone marching to render fractals into G-buffer. Then deferred lighting is calculated. 3D geometry can recieve AO and approximated shadows from fractals. Collisions are calculated on GPU.
